name: The Descent (itch) (TheCodeAnvil)
description:
The Descent is a game where you are a spy who is escaping from a burning building. Your only way of escape: an elevator.  Unfortunately there are also some bad guys determined to stop you. Fight them and make your way down to the first floor to win!

Controls:

WASD to move, hold A or D against a wall to wall run, left click to shoot, SPACE to jump.
